item.title: By: Steven McCormick
item.dc:creator: Steven McCormick
item.description: <p>Shiny, shiny, shiny toys......yup, give you that one then. <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /> Enjoy and look forward to hearing your comments on it.</p>
item.content:encoded: Shiny, shiny, shiny toys……yup, give you that one then. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ /> Enjoy and look forward to hearing your comments on it.

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Well obviously it would be great to have 160gb and the touch interface but if I have to choose the new touch seems more appealing to me.<br /><br />Battery life is the killer with the hard drive iPods so until there is some new technology to support the best of both worlds I'll go with shiny <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded:
Well obviously it would be great to have 160gb and the touch interface but if I have to choose the new touch seems more appealing to me.

Battery life is the killer with the hard drive iPods so until there is some new technology to support the best of both worlds I’ll go with shiny http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />

item.title: By: Steven McCormick
item.dc:creator: Steven McCormick
item.description: <p>Very shiny indeed, sadly I'm with Kerr making a comment about capacity. Give a iPod touch 160gb of storage then that's an awesome shiny gadget with capacity to handle lots of video which is what that lovely screen will be good for. I will be updating my 5th gen 60gb to a 6th gen 160gb and will wait for the updated iPod touch. <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded: Very shiny indeed, sadly I’m with Kerr making a comment about capacity. Give a iPod touch 160gb of storage then that’s an awesome shiny gadget with capacity to handle lots of video which is what that lovely screen will be good for. I will be updating my 5th gen 60gb to a 6th gen 160gb and will wait for the updated iPod touch. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />

item.title: By: Kerr
item.dc:creator: Kerr
item.description: <p>I'm disapointed. I wanted the new iPod touch to have a honking great HD in it. I've got a 60Gb 5th gen iPod so there's not a lot of point getting a 160GB 6th gen, but I'd get a touch one if it had enough storage.<br /><br />I'd like to watch more video on the bigger screen, so why not give me the storage to cope with lots of video?<br /><br />Pah! <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$File/undecided.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded:
I’m disapointed. I wanted the new iPod touch to have a honking great HD in it. I’ve got a 60Gb 5th gen iPod so there’s not a lot of point getting a 160GB 6th gen, but I’d get a touch one if it had enough storage.

I’d like to watch more video on the bigger screen, so why not give me the storage to cope with lots of video?

Pah! http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$File/undecided.gif“ />

item.title: By: Rob McDonagh
item.dc:creator: Rob McDonagh
item.description: <p>I'm with you, Matt. This is the one I've been waiting for since they announced the iPhone. <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded: I’m with you, Matt. This is the one I’ve been waiting for since they announced the iPhone. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif“ />
